userPasswordConfirmModal.description: You enter the danger zone. Please confirm your password to continue with this action. This is a security measure to prevent unauthorized access to your account.
userPasswordConfirmModal.title: Confirm password

app.fallbackDescription: The saas-template is a template for building SaaS applications. It combines the capabilities of Laravel and Nuxt in a unified repository and accelerates the development of web applications. Seamlessly integrates the back-end reliability of Laravel with the front-end agility of Nuxt. Ideal for rapid prototyping and deployment.
app.title: {title} - saas-template

header.description: Here you will find tools that help you to develop and debug your application. Use them to improve your development workflow.
header.title: Developer tools

global.tryAgainIn: Try again in a second. | Try again in {count} seconds.

error.description: An error occurred while verifying your email address. Please try again.

success.description: Your email address has been successfully verified. You will be redirected in a few seconds. {0}.

emailIsNotVerifiedAlert.title: Please verify your email address. If you can't find the verification email, take a look at your spam folder or request a new one.
